评论详情: 6’ 195 lbs - bought a large. Fits perfectly and super comfortable. Feels like pajamas.
Got a large for my husband. He is 6'2“ 200lbs and it was perfect! It fit much better than I expected. He said it felt like pj's, the pockets were a little small, but other than that it was great!
I wore this to an 80's party and got plenty of compliments.  It ran a little big (I bought a medium).

评论概述: Cheaply made, thin and the pockets are awful, but damn did I look good
评论详情: It’s thin, and cheaply made.  I was cold.  The pockets are small and weirdly positioned.
Super soft and good quality.
Warm and well made.

评论概述: Comfy and good to dance in

I am 6 foot 1, 195 and got a large. It fit me well! Good material, and fun to wear. Got alot of compliments.
Bought this for a Halloween costume expecting a paper-like fabric.  This is more track-suit and durable quality.  (Not that I'd wear it many places other than Halloween parties.)
Fun to wear and true to size. Will wear again
This will be the perfect addition to my costumes for an upcoming Halloween cruise. I now have costumes for every decade from the 1920s to the 1980s in addition to several other theme costumes.
Better quality material and finish than I expected for the price! Fit is true to size!

I read reviews before sizing up to a large. I’m 5’9”, 150 lbs, athletic body type. Both the pants and the top were huge on me so sizing is apparently random. Good luck. Maybe choose a couple of sizes and send back what you don’t need if you have to have this. Also, the material was extremely hot and not breathable.
Too bad Amazon has customer service centers for questions you have in a foreign country you don’t matter in.
I look like Ken doll from the 90s in PJs
Got lots of compliment for this suit. Gives vibrant look. Great for cool weather.
Got outfit from my husband. He got so many compliments on this cute set. Super me and comfortable

I accidently ordered the large versus medium, but I'm glad I did because this thing barely fit in length in both arms & legs. Order a size up. I'm 5'9" 140 lbs .  Other than that, pretty solid purchase.
I love this so much and wanted it because “I LOVE THE 80’s” so disappointed it didn’t
I really enjoyed this

Wore these to the local RADwood show and was a total hit. RADwood is a car show celebrating everything 80s and 90s. This outfit fit right in. Several people asked where I got it. I should have set up an affiliate link.
Perfect fit and looked great
This is a cute little tracksuit it fits well i actually got it for myself and not my husband lol I love the whole theme of this super retro the dark is dark and the lights are super bright!

My husband loves this. He's a little, uh, unique. He loves it, even though he looks like a trapper keeper. It runs true to size. I tried banning him from wearing it in public, but he got so many comments on it, he now wears it regularly. I make sure to walk way ahead of him in stores now.

评论概述: Cute but hot.Good for cooler weather.
评论详情: I'm typically a torrid 2 or 3 and bought a XXL instead of the recommended xl by Amazon.This is very stretchy and pretty warm. It's not small like usual china size. It's also unisex so keep that in mind for sizing.  I haven't washed it yet so we will see how it holds up.

评论概述: Nice fun outfit, not made out of the nicest material for price!
评论详情: TLDR: Nice fun outfit, not made out of the nicest material for price! If you are looking for something fun, then this is definitely for you! The colors are bright, it fits like expected, and it is definitely out there and unique. I think this would be perfect for a party or a fun dance or club outing! I am a female and can fit in a large size nicely! I will probably wear the pants out just for fun on a regular day as well, but got this for fun parties too. My only complaint is the material just doesn’t seem very nice for the price. It’s pretty warm and not very breathable. I think you can find a nicer quality set for just a little more, but if thats not an issue for you then this may be for you.

评论概述: If I could give ten stars, I would!
评论详情: Got this amazing 80's track suit for my school's decades days they have twice a year.  Take a look at the video.  What more can I say.  It's an awesome suit - quality material, well made, feels worthy of my dance moves.
Ordered size medium for a 5’8 135lb teen boy and was perfect size
Bought this for a 90s theme party- worked perfectly for that.  True to size.  Good quality. Not sure this would stand the test of time, but it works well for its intended use!
Supero mis expectativas, me gustó mucho la tela, es muy cómodo. Está bien hecho y que muy bien.  Valió la pena por el precio.
